After seeing the last terasu parody of Fate GO I realized that the real MCs are us who expect more from this story but it will never be given to us, because terasu MC knows that we see his work because of the intrigue of which will be the final. The truth is that Terasu MC is the same case of other NTR artists good art zero plot only sells morbid If you want a better work similar to this one but with more history, I recommend the artist DRAMUS.

As of the context, she is out of the loop. She genuinely respects Hiroki as someone that saved her from bullying. She tried to make him return to Karate at the start. She confessed when they were younger. He was impressed of her body. She called the senpai for sexual harassment. He thought that after all his training and the support of this friend he could beat the guy. The attack it is all a roleplay, she remarks the black strenght. She tells the story of how she started karate to never lose against males again. Hiroki is someone she feels indebted. When she meet the black guy her body instinctively felt weak. The feeling of weakness lead to her awakening to masturbation. He invited her to his home and she refused weakly "I'll hate you if you try something weird" she said. But like the Childhood friend, the feeling of having her body below made her fall. Since then they were constantly fucking. He ask who is stronger between both males. She admits Hiroki can't win.
Terasu's works really go by my expectations. Now do it with the whole fam while he's watching. No fucking revenge with that lil dick.
